name: CYDONIA 2
description:
Our beloved character is back! After an horrible accident, you must rescue Dr Martins. Fight and defend in beatiful but dangerous scenarios, featuring a new and enhanced gameplay mechanics and game modes.

First version played more than 5 millon times. It helped us a lot to create a new improved experience. New weapons, new game modes, achievements, and the addition of Wardrobe, a place where you can now unlock and pick character skins.

NOTE: This game was released a long time ago, when Flash was still popular. This game, and others, are part of SETENTIA's archive, so we can organize our content, in a single page, for historical purposes.
